email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Given the current market, I was hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can we work on this? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight. How about we meet in the middle at $50.00 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan is still October 15-20? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20. I’ll have the charter party agreement drafted and sent to you by end of day. Let me know if you need any additional details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. Looking forward to reviewing the agreement. Let’s aim to finalize everything by tomorrow. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Agreement Attached
email_chain.body: Hi John, as promised, I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you have any questions or need further adjustments. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
